#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#define ll long long int
#define s(a) scanf("%lld",&a)

using namespace std;

int main()
{
    ll t,n,k,i,j,tot;
    s(t);
    while(t--) {
        s(n);s(k);
        ll a[101]={0};
        a[0]=1;
        a[1]=1;
        for(i=2;i<=n;i++) {
            a[i]=a[i-1];
            for(j=2;j<k;j++) {
                if(j>i) break;
                if(__gcd(j,k)>1) continue;
                if(i==j) {a[i]++;continue;}
                a[i]=a[i-j-1]+a[i];
            }
          //  cout<<a[i]<<endl;
        }
        cout<<a[n]<<endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
